entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-17

Issues

Updated

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-21409 | .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #303

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Activity.SetParentId()`allows creation of `ActivitySpanId` that breaks `==` expectations #101219
  • Threads 99% of the Blocked causing slowdown #101216
  • ILLink analyzer doesn't warn for invalid annotations in top-level methods #101215
  • ILLink analyzer produces dataflow warnings even for invalid annotations #101211
  • unable to detect Socket.Send failures #101210
  • [wasm] Timeout in System.Text.Json.Tests #101204
    9.0.0
  • Trim/AOT analyzer missing some ILC warnings #101203
  • [API Proposal]: TypeDescriptor-related trimming support #101202
    9.0.0
  • Support Windows 10 for System.Net.Quic #101200
  • Trimmer, NativeAOT, and Trim analyzer have inconsistent UnsafeAccessor behavior #101195
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Chunk method #101194
  • Timeout in System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteNumbers #101193
  • Trim analyzer doesn't perform dataflow analysis on backing field #101191
    Future
  • TimeSpan.Parse(string) converts hour values > 24 to day values #101187
  • It is possible to create an InterpolatedStringHandler that will accept non-interpolated strings? #101185
  • Behaviour of GC HeapHardLimit #101183
  • Assert correct HttpRequestError in tests #101177
  • JIT: IV widening does not kick in for simple foreach over `List<int>` #101176
    9.0.0
  • Codegen generates code referencing RuntimeType for `__Canon[]` #101175
  • RunAOTCompilation will cause calling to wasm export function throws a "uninitialized element" error #101170
  • [browser] move console proxy from runtime code into test-main #101169
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] TimeZoneInfoTests.ChangeLocalTimeZone not thread safe #101166
    9.0.0
  • CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo(string) -> cache pollution bug #101165
  • Backport of #95390 (SignedXml.CheckSignature failing for valid Enveloped signature) seems to have failed #101163
  • JIT: cmp + jump + jump #101160
    Future
  • What's the recommended way to serialize a customized exception in .NET 8+ #101159
  • How to use CoSetProxyBlanket in P/Invoke source generator? #101157
  • ConvertDllsToWebCil fails ugly for invalid assembly #101154
    9.0.0
  • Investigate ways to make GC stress compatible with WaitForPendingFinalizers #101150

Closed

  • LNK2001 Error When Linking Static Library with NativeAOT Project #101209
  • [net9.0-preview3]: NativeAOT System.Text.Json throws "System.NotSupportedException: 'System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonDerivedTypeAttribute[]' is missing native code or metadata." #101205
  • System.Net.HttpListener.Tests failure: Expected _associatedHttp11ConnectionCount=0 > _availableHttp11Connections.Count=0 #95220
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json failing some large file tests #59678
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests on Mono_Minijit_Debug-Ubuntu #100715
  • [Mono] App crashes with BadImageFormatException: Method has no body #101074
    9.0.0
  • Expose content length decoder on AsnDecoder #101125
    9.0.0
  • Blazor WebAssembly AOT Fails On Windows For Paths With a Space #101055
    9.0.0
  • JIT: CSE removes throwing modulo computation on x86 #101028
    9.0.0
  • [release/7.0] WBT tests disabled, till a new sdk is available #77740
    7.0.x
  • Loop condition vs initial guard check impacts bounds checking #83349
    9.0.0
  • [Jit] Loop condition doesn't elide bounds check #9422
    9.0.0
  • Mono Wasm V8 System.Text.Encodings.Web.Tests failure #100830
  • [browser][mt] SignalRClientTests timeouts #100388
    9.0.0
  • [System.Convert]::FromBase64String causes memory leak with large strings #101061
  • [cdac] Enable the DAC to delegate operations to the cDAC #99301
    9.0.0
  • Add HttpClient tests for doing client authentication with a certificate with no private key #19079
  • [HttpListener] HttpListener tests are blocking xunit workers, causing hangs #21870
  • HttpListener on Unix doesn't track amount of data written to output stream #21918
  • [HttpListener][Managed] HttpListenerWebSocketContext close handshakes should not fail #22015
  • Eliminate code duplication between HttpUtility and WebUtility #22175
  • [LSRA] Further tuning of preferencing is needed #11959

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Optimize out references to a bunch of BCL methods during JS interop startup #101217
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add tests for dataflow with invalid annotations #101214
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add `alpine` to target triplet for crossbuild #101213
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Preserve static type info for return value of ctor #101212
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [cdac] Read contract descriptor from target #101208
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Optimize jiterpreter option table updates #101207
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix a compiler error on alpine-arm64 #101206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [PERF][Release/7.0] Update queues. #101198
    area-Infrastructure
  • Reuse more templates in our build #101197
    area-Infrastructure
  • Tensor prototype #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add managed blocking info for lock and monitor waits #101192
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Allow user to specify a rundown keyword to override the default. #101189
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Count*BitElements #101188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Disallow frozen `RuntimeType` for canonical types #101173
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Tar: support GNU numeric format. #101172
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [release/6.0] Avoid rooting X509Certificate2 in SslSessionCache #101167
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Fix ConvertDllsToWebCil stack dump on bad input to be error message with input path #101162
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove defensive copies in `System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext` #101161
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Fix `NamespaceCache` usage in `System.Private.Xml.Linq` #101158
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Fix generic runtime lookup expansion in Tier0 #101153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Test Only] async safe point interrupts before NOP change #101152
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [Test Only] async safe point interrupts after NOP change #101151
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Update locker.yml #101218
    area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "Add params ReadOnlySpan<T> overloads" #101123
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Move first chance exception notification so the !pe works #101190
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [PERF][Release/6.0] Update queues. #101201
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [PERF][Release/8.0] Update queues. #101094
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] fix SendTo with SocketAsyncEventArgs #99695
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.x
  • Keep our System.Text.Json version used in HostModel in sync with MSBuild #101199
    area-HostModel
  • Improve resiliency of custom attribute parsing #101164
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Use likelihoods in block reordering decision #101132
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove regex tests blocking on async calls #100982
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm] Fix AOT publish in paths with space on Windows/Linux #101109
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [docs] Document tools tests workflow #101186
    documentation, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono][interp] Resolve virtual method on delegates created by compiled code #101168
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add AsnDecoder {Try}DecodeLength #101141
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • JIT: Model JIT helper exceptions correctly in VN #101062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] New ABI classifiers #101114
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] install Firefox on helix #101171
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add support for bounds check no throw assertions in range check and make overflow check more precise #100777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] easy prep for Firefox #101138
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Make DAC load and use cDAC when available #100946
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Merge #91634 into release/8.0 #100994
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host
  • Insert a breakpoint instruction after throwing calls #101037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Move profile checking back until just before inlining #101011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • GC: Fix survival rates for LOH/POH #100716
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Initialize values for yield normalization during startup #99991
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • Update EOL versions in release/8.0-staging #101073
    Servicing-approved, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Changed GetNetworkInterfaces method to to retrieve information related to all interfaces #100824
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Introduce a `BuildAllTestsAsStandalone` environment variable to support some local dev scenarios. #100709
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Implement a JSON contract reader #100966
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Handle > 64 registers + predicate registers for Arm64 #98258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Run DependencyInjection trimming tests as native AOT. #101129
    linkable-framework, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #100427
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix missing explicit frame pop on arm32 #101147
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix regression from RuntimeType.AllocateValueType rewrite #101137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Weak interior handles #100446
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [S390x] Fix stack offset size while passing structure as argument. #101103
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Avoid rooting X509Certificate2 in SslSessionCache #101144
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • Process.Linux: handle when /proc and the process pid namespace don't match. #100076
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Fix function signature mismatch in m2n invoke #101106
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [cdac] cdac-build-tool #100650
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [browser] rename WasmTestOnChrome #101140
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mt] Add signalR WBT on WASM browser app #100723
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • Remove more helper frames #100939
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Simplify "secret stub arg" handling between JIT and EE #100823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid some defensive copies on readonly structs in System.Net.Quic #101133
    area-System.Net
  • [release/8.0][mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #100810
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • [WIP][mono] Enable runtime tests in AOT modes on linux-arm64 #100685
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Adjust the calleeSavedRegs on top frame for LoongArch64/RISCV64 #100962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Refresh cached credentials after PreAuthenticate fails #101053
    area-System.Net.Http
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add SwiftError support for Swift reverse pinvokes #101122
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Synchronized description of destinationDirectoryName parameter #100330
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Reduce frozen collection creation overheads for ignore-case with ASCII values #100998
    area-System.Collections
  • Only add interface methods to _virtual_methods cache #101139
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IsHidden on HostSpecificTemplateData for CLI #40259
  • Parsing of arguments works different for MSbuild and dotnet build commands #40236
  • Overload resolution ambiguity introduced by SDK 8.0.300-preview.24203.14 #40235

Closed

  • [8.0.100-rc.2] Potential for incompatibility between Razor Tooling in Visual Studio and the .NET SDK #35810
    8.0.1xx
  • dotnet list package not working, if msbuild properties are not defaulting #40255
  • [9.0-preview.2] Inconsistent messaging of success vs. warnings from dotnet test #39665
  • .NET 6.0.28 unable find pkg Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host.ubuntu.22.04-x64 #40217

PullRequests

Created

  • More workload set fixes #40266
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #40263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40258
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #40256
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add APICompat support for checking generic constraints #40230
    Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • Only pack as tool shim in VMR builds when signing is possible #40262
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #40048
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #40081
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge dotnet/Installer `src` and `test` folder histories #40084
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add repository policy to label and close stale issues #40226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • Correct arguments passed to the subcommand in presence of -- #40120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Request silent restore for all separate restore steps #40148
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow 'Add project reference' for existing projects #40133
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [Static Web Assets] Introduce static web asset endpoints and define compression endpoints #39636
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Re-enable a bunch of container tests #40191
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Params collections and older language versions #8061

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update README.md #8062

Updated

  • Update ref-in-async speclet #8056
  • Take "non-enumerable collection types" out of C# 12 #8055
  • Clarify "Delegate type for the anonymous function or method group" section in ref-struct-interfaces.md #8058

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiler task is passing `/generatedfilesout` even though it didn't create the directory #73075
  • Error when performing namespace adjust for solution or sync namespace context menu #73072
  • IDE0053 has a non-deterministic title in SARIF logs #73070
    17.11
  • `KeyNotFoundException` during compilation of `goto` that leaves lambda #73068
  • Cutting/Pasting a selected Region fails to persist it's collapsed state #73065
    Backlog

Closed

  • Source Generation Issue #73061
  • CS8998 when last character is double quote in raw string literal #73063

PullRequests

Created

  • Have the workspace cache the semantic model (after it is acquired) for the active document (if one exists). #73074
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • DO NOT MERGE. Implement MEF based pull diagnostics #73073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Pass along cancellation token in snippets #73071
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow WatchHotReloadService to change capabilities during session #73066
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #73062
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces

Merged

  • Add comment for max lambda binding value #73050
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Report error creating delegate from partial generic method without implementation #73060
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Use frozen partial semantics for snippet evaluation #73067
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Acquire semantic model from Document instead of making a fresh one #73069
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use a simpler pattern when working with stacks #73057
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Replace deprecated CI image #73043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Port https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/72964 to release/dev17.10 #73058
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix a couple of issues with extension lookup/binding #72848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles

Updated

  • Document deviation from member lookup standard #72858
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Fix issue in editor config filepath comparison #73033
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.11
  • Switch to an explicit stack to avoid stack overflow when computing tree equivalence #73056
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update `InitializeHandler` to support `VSInternalClientCapabilities` #72960
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Followup work to handle ForegroundThreadAffinitizedObject removal. #73049
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Nullable analysis of conditional operator should use best common type unless target typed #73047
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use semantics to check for readonly struct #72893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Move to an iterative approach to determining next sibling in the blender #73054
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement Lookup APIs on extensions #72948
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor routing fails when a query string is present #55187
  • Perf regression: single_query #55186
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #55185
  • Pass an object as a parameter to a minimal API endpoint #55184
  • Unable to RDP to servers after downloading .6.0.9 Core inside #55183
  • No arm64 installer for .NET 8.0 Windows Hosting Bundle #55180
  • ApiController: memory leak when returning large string arrays #55179
  • Service Fabric React template - blank page after run #55178
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55176
  • Binding to IFormFileCollection results in empty collection #55174

Closed

  • Ability to clone HttpContext for scatter gather scenarios #53565
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55150
  • Perf regression: plaintext #55175
  • Missing TimeProvider implementation for Identity #53938
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor SSR with multiple forms, validation not working #55173
  • How to dispose delegate in blazor or c# #55177
  • [Blazor] Provide API to determine assembly for a give route #55004
  • NTLM authentication not working in Linux based environment #55146
  • Fix for: There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm'. #55132
  • Blazor WebApp template is not working as described #55133
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #55151
  • Perf regression: single_query #55168

PullRequests

Created

  • Update locker.yml #55188
    area-infrastructure
  • Merge feature/openapi to main #55182
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Condition RIDs on which target RIDs are available when doing a VMR build #55172
    area-networking

Merged

  • Add missing TimeProvider registration #53946
    area-identity, community-contribution, 9.0-preview4
  • Add HybridCache public API #55084
    feature-caching, area-runtime, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • [Blazor] Use JSON source generator during WebAssembly startup #54956
    area-blazor
  • Using SearchValues in ContentDispositionHeaderValue #55039
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Implement minimal implementation of HybridCache #55147
    area-networking
  • Ensuring deleted cookies are recognized by the browser by ensuring the MaxAge within CookieOptions is set to null. #55169
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Per-page opt out from interactive routing #55157
    area-blazor
  • update project templates package reference #55155
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI webapi call fails FATAL #21893
  • Erratic Behavior in Button's on Text Change #21890
  • Multiple bugs in Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.IImage platform specific implementations #21886
  • Indexers on basemodels not recognized in XAML when used on properties of derived class #21878
  • `TargetName` attribute in `<Setter>`s does not work with custom controls #21877
  • Flyout open close with some lagging #21876
  • Named pipes on MacOS can't connect in .NET 8 #21874
  • Ability to detect whether we are connected via a VPN on iOS #21873
  • WebAuthenticator iOS/MacCatalyst uses Default Web Browser (rejected by App Store reviewer) #21872
  • MAUI CollectionView filter with SearchBar text input lagging on ios #21871

Closed

  • XamlC Compilation errors when upgrading to Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.20 #21757
    .NET 8 SR4
  • BlazorWebView: Use AppContext.BaseDirectory instead of Environment.CurrentDirectory #21750
    .NET 9 Planning
  • MAUI app crashes on Android in debug mode and has errors in release mode #21525
  • In Visual Studio 17.10.0 Preview 3 Project Properties do not open anymore #21758
  • Running app one day without touching it craching after move to other page #21576
  • Cannot put spaces in project names - Maui then attempts to use underscores in App manifest name which are not allowed - causes failure to build #21172
  • MAUI Windows application not navigating when app not in focus. #21158
    Backlog
  • CollectionView crash on scroll: 'The specified child already has a parent. You must call removeView() on the child's parent first.' #21565

PullRequests

Created

  • Update locker.yml #21894
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Remove 2nd WebView used to add `base` tag when using HtmlWebViewSource #21892
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [tests] add `SourceGen.UnitTests` to CI #21889
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in gestures #21887
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, memory-leak 💦
  • Remove excess check #21883
  • [C] Propagate resources when reparenting #21879

Merged

  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #21882
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • fix: Use AppContext.BaseDirectory instead of Environment.CurrentDirec… #21797
    area/blazor 🕸️, community ✨
  • [Trimming] Use new feature switch definition attribute and enable analyzers in Controls.Core.csproj #21621

Updated

  • WIP: Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #21867
    area/blazor 🕸️, do-not-merge
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo and Mono dependencies #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Added TimePicker TimeSelected Event (Reopened) #21156
    area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • [Windows] Implement `IdleSynchronizer` #20630
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [iOS] Set text color of unselected TabbedPage tabs #18777
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/TabbedPage, community ✨, potential-regression
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak with CollectionView #21850
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, memory-leak 💦
  • Binding source generator #21725
    area/Xaml </>
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EFCore 8: DbContext (StateManager) adds back previously detached entities #33557
  • Error EF 8 : Unable to create a 'DbContext' of type ''. #33556
  • How to suppress ESCAPE clause in generated SQL for StartsWith/EndsWith/Contains ? #33555
  • No suitable constructor was found for entity type 'CollectionEntry' #33554
  • "No store type was specified for the decimal property" warning with `HasConversion<string>()` specified for property when creating a new migration #33553
  • String computed primary key issues. #33549

PullRequests

Created

  • Separate public pipeline #33552
  • Use placeholder value to fix CredScan #33550

Merged

  • Update DotNetBuild.props #33551

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix parameter names for nested types in complex type equality (#33527) #33548
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.6

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-17
entry.content:
PullRequests
